metadata.Title: CVE-2018-9243 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: GitLab Community and Enterprise Editions version 8.4 up to 10.4 are vulnerable to XSS because a lack of input validation in the merge request component leads to cross site scripting (specifically, filenames in changes tabs of merge requests). This is fixed in 10.6.3, 10.5.7, and 10.4.7.

notes.Note: msalvatore> Affects GitLab CE/EE 8.4 and up.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
